data.title: Meggitt Sensing Systems Announces Worldwide Endevco Cable Delivery Improvement Initiative
data.meta_description: Meggitt Sensing Systems, a Meggitt group division, has announced the expansion of its Guaranteed InStock program to include a major Endevco cable assembly delivery improvement initiative.
data.text:
October 27, 2011 San Juan Capistrano, California, USA â€“ Meggitt Sensing Systems, a Meggitt group division, has announced the expansion of its Guaranteed InStock program to include a major Endevco cable assembly delivery improvement initiative.

As part of the new program offerings, Meggitt customers can choose from among 18 unique cable product families, in either standard or custom lengths, in typical ordering quantities, for worldwide shipment within one week or less. Cable families included under this program represent some of Meggitts most popular offerings, including:

-The Endevco model 3090C-XXX (XXX denotes length in inches) premium, noise-treated (low noise) softline cable assembly, offering reliable operation from -254C (-423F) to +260C (+500F). The model 3090C is designed for compatibility with both high- and low-impedance piezoelectric accelerometers, in support of general purpose aerospace, automotive, industrial and test and measurement applications.

-The Endevco model 3075M6-XXX hardline cable assembly, offering high-reliability performance to +482C (+900F) in support of high-temperature aerospace, automotive, industrial, power generation and test & measurement requirements.

-The Endevco model 6917B-XXX Teflon jacketed cable assembly, designed to mate with differential output accelerometers with two-pin 7/16-27 UNS-2A threaded receptacle, typically used in turbofan environments up to +260C (+500F). It features a specially designed plug assembly with high force contacts and aluminum inserts for high-temperature operation, with a removable backshell for field replacement.

Meggitt designs and manufactures all of its own cables and connectors for optimal performance in extreme environments. In-house expertise extends to both standard and custom designs, including low-noise, high-temperature and multi-conductor models. All cables and connectors are subjected to rigorous quality assurance testing, ensuring their reliability within the intended application environment.

All Endevco cables are backed by a five-year comprehensive product warranty. Additional cable assembly families will be regularly added to the Guaranteed InStock program offering, in response to customer demand. For the most up-to-date listing, visit http://www.endevco.com/feature/GuaranteedInStock.html

About Meggitt Sensing Systems

Meggitt Sensing Systems, a Meggitt group division (www.meggitt.com), is a leading supplier of high-performance sensing and monitoring systems for physical parameter measurements in extreme environments. It has operated since 1927 through its antecedentsECET, Endevco, Ferroperm Piezoceramics, Lodge Ignition, Sensorex, Vibro-Meter and Wilcoxon Researchwhose portfolios form the basis of product lines offered by todays Meggitt Sensing Systems. Meggitts Endevco range of piezoelectric, piezoresistive, Isotron and variable capacitance accelerometers, piezoresistive pressure transducers, acoustic sensors, electronic instruments and calibration systems ensure critical accuracy and reliability within aerospace, automotive, defense, industrial, medical, power generation, R&D, space and test and measurement applications. Endevco and Isotron are registered trademarks of the Meggitt group. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners.
